page.title: 09Computers in 1985
page.content: In my house only my father and I ever use my{computer}as the rest of the family hate it! I have a large games collection which consists mainly of{Arcade and {Adventure games.}I spend about two-thirds of my time{playing}computer games and the rest{programming.}I have fun trying to break into the games to change the number of lives etc. In my class about{seventy five {percent}of the children{own}a computer. The most popular types are the Commodore 64, Spectrum, Dragon Tandy, BBC Model B and ;the Armstrad. All of the home computers here have 64k memory. The world's best selling computer is the{Commodore 64}and Britain's is the{Spectrum.}
